name: Cat Fight (houseinwoodsgames)
description:
A local 2 player fighting game created for Together Jam 2022.

Fight as Felix or Kitty

This game is played with a keyboard.

Only available windows. In both .exe and .zip format.

Controls:
All the controls are keyboard only. No mouse or gamepad support.

Player 1:

W = Jump (Menu Up)

A = Move

S = Crouch (Menu Down)

D = Move

U = Punch 1

I = Kick 1

K = Kick 2

J = Punch 2 (Select)

U + I = Power In Numbers

Double tap:

A or D to sprint

Player 2:

Arrow Up = Jump

Arrow Left = Move

Arrow Down = Crouch

Arrow Right = Move

NUMPAD 4 = Punch 1

NUMPAD 5 = Kick 1

NUMPAD 2 = Kick 2

NUMPAD 1 = Punch 2 (select)

NUMPAD 4 + NUMPAD 5 = Power In Numbers

Double tap:

Arrow Left or Arrow Right to sprint

Music:

The Smiler (1907, Zonophone Concert Band) by Percy Wenrich

https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/24157/

The Builder by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

Creative Commons CC BY 3.0

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
